author: jannik031153
content: Hello! Is there any reason why cancellation/replacement transactions would propagate differently than the rest? It seems like those take longer to be included. For example, this one: https://etherscan.io/tx/0x92ea4ccb8368d7f7d2284c26bbe18ddbd53f88ce42604908fdf589f0993fe70d. According to Etherscan it was confirmed in 40s, but it could have been included in three blocks prior.
